title: Writing in Standard Form
text: We can divide both sides by $$36$$ to get $$\frac{x}{36}=y^2$$

title: Finding The Characteristics
text: From the equation, we know that $$p=\frac{1}{144}$$. This means that the vertex is $$(0,0)$$, the focus is $$(\frac{1}{144},0)$$ and the directrix is $$x=\frac{-1}{144}$$
